resources.string: The Pebble Pager is an application for the Pebble Smartwatch. The application on the watch allows for the user to page the phone. This is useful for when the phone is lost or stolen. \n \n To get started, after the Pebble Pager application is installed, click the Install on Pebble button. This will send the watch application to the Pebble watch. Once that is complete a menu item is added to the Pebble watch. Use the watch to navigate to the "Pebble Pager" option on the watch. Clicking this button will then ring the phone with the chosen ringtone.
